TopicTitle: Mods That Work With The Latest KSP for Aviation and Military Aviation?

Articles.Content:
I need mods that work with the latest KSP, and are good for aviation.
I have:
Airplane Plus
BD Armory
SXT
NiceMk Series
MPR
AoA Tech
SMI Missiles
B9 Procedural Wings

Carrier Expansioin (And Parts)
QuizTech Aero Pack
Automated Aerial Refueling
Cold War Aerospace
